Orme vs. Lodge. Error to. Montgomery County Court. An action of slander was. brought by the plaintiff in error, to which the defendant in error put in the plea of justification short, tinder an agreement that it- should be considered as if a good and valid plea of justification had been put in at length in a formal and legal manner, and so plead as the law required a legal justification in such a case to be pleaded, and the issue regularly joined thereon.
